attributes.action: Hold a parliamentary vote on whether the United Kingdom should leave the EU
attributes.background: Following the UK referendum to leave the European Union, the undersigned believe that the non-binding, advisory nature of the referendum is not sufficient for a decision of this magnitude to be taken. Without the full endorsement of parliament the United Kingdom should not invoke Article 50.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
